trans-unit.source: Multi-Geo Help documentation | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Multi-Geo Help documentation | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to create a workspace and publish a web service in an Azure region different from the South Central United States (SCUS) Azure region.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to create a workspace and publish a web service in an Azure region different from the South Central United States (SCUS) Azure region.

trans-unit.source: Multi-Geo Help documentation
trans-unit.target: Multi-Geo Help documentation

trans-unit.source: Currently, all Azure Machine Learning assets are hosted in the South Central United States (SCUS) Azure region.
trans-unit.target: Currently, all Azure Machine Learning assets are hosted in the South Central United States (SCUS) Azure region.

trans-unit.source: This article describes how you can create a workspace and publish a web service in other Azure regions.
trans-unit.target: This article describes how you can create a workspace and publish a web service in other Azure regions.

trans-unit.source: Create a workspace
trans-unit.target: Create a workspace

trans-unit.source: Sign in to the Azure Management Portal.
trans-unit.target: Sign in to the Azure Management Portal.

trans-unit.source: Click **+NEW** > **DATA SERVICES** > **MACHINE LEARNING** > **QUICK CREATE**.
trans-unit.target: Click **+NEW** > **DATA SERVICES** > **MACHINE LEARNING** > **QUICK CREATE**.

trans-unit.source: Under **LOCATION** select another region, such as **Southeast Asia**.
trans-unit.target: Under **LOCATION** select another region, such as **Southeast Asia**.

trans-unit.source: ![Multi-Geo Help image 1][1]
trans-unit.target: ![Multi-Geo Help image 1][1]

trans-unit.source: Select the workspace, and then click **Sign-in to ML Studio**.
trans-unit.target: Select the workspace, and then click **Sign-in to ML Studio**.

trans-unit.source: ![Multi-Geo Help image 2][2]
trans-unit.target: ![Multi-Geo Help image 2][2]

trans-unit.source: You now have a workspace in another region that you may use just like any other workspace.
trans-unit.target: You now have a workspace in another region that you may use just like any other workspace.

trans-unit.source: To switch among your workspaces, look to the upper right of your screen.
trans-unit.target: To switch among your workspaces, look to the upper right of your screen.

trans-unit.source: Click the dropdown, select the region, and then select the workspace.
trans-unit.target: Click the dropdown, select the region, and then select the workspace.

trans-unit.source: Everything is local to the workspace region; for example, all of your web services created from a workspace will be in the same region the workspace is located in.
trans-unit.target: Everything is local to the workspace region; for example, all of your web services created from a workspace will be in the same region the workspace is located in.

trans-unit.source: ![Multi-Geo Help image 3][3]
trans-unit.target: ![Multi-Geo Help image 3][3]

trans-unit.source: Open an experiment from Gallery
trans-unit.target: Open an experiment from Gallery

trans-unit.source: If you open an experiment from Gallery, you can also select which region you want to copy the experiment to.
trans-unit.target: If you open an experiment from Gallery, you can also select which region you want to copy the experiment to.

trans-unit.source: ![Multi-Geo Help image 4][4a]
trans-unit.target: ![Multi-Geo Help image 4][4a]

trans-unit.source: Web service management
trans-unit.target: Web service management

trans-unit.source: To programmatically manage web services, such as for retraining, use the region-specific address: **https://asiasoutheast.management.azureml.net**
trans-unit.target: To programmatically manage web services, such as for retraining, use the region-specific address: **https://asiasoutheast.management.azureml.net**

trans-unit.source: Things to note
trans-unit.target: Things to note

trans-unit.source: You can only copy experiments between workspaces that belong to the same region.
trans-unit.target: You can only copy experiments between workspaces that belong to the same region.

trans-unit.source: In the future, we will enable copying experiments between workspaces across multiple regions.
trans-unit.target: In the future, we will enable copying experiments between workspaces across multiple regions.

trans-unit.source: The region selector will only show workspaces for one region at a time.
trans-unit.target: The region selector will only show workspaces for one region at a time.

trans-unit.source: In the future, you will be able to see a full list of workspaces you have access to across all regions at the same time.
trans-unit.target: In the future, you will be able to see a full list of workspaces you have access to across all regions at the same time.

trans-unit.source: A free workspace or Guest Access (anonymous) workspace will be created and hosted in South Central U.S.
trans-unit.target: A free workspace or Guest Access (anonymous) workspace will be created and hosted in South Central U.S.

trans-unit.source: In the future, you will be able to create Free/Guest Access workspaces in the region that you choose.
trans-unit.target: In the future, you will be able to create Free/Guest Access workspaces in the region that you choose.

trans-unit.source: Web services deployed from a workspace in Southeast Asia will also be hosted in Southeast Asia.
trans-unit.target: Web services deployed from a workspace in Southeast Asia will also be hosted in Southeast Asia.

trans-unit.source: In the future, you will be able to have the flexibility of creating experiments in one region, and deploying generated web service endpoints into different regions.
trans-unit.target: In the future, you will be able to have the flexibility of creating experiments in one region, and deploying generated web service endpoints into different regions.

trans-unit.source: More information
trans-unit.target: More information

trans-unit.source: Ask a question on the [Azure Machine Learning forum](https://social.msdn.microsoft.com/Forums/azure/home?forum=MachineLearning).
trans-unit.target: Ask a question on the [Azure Machine Learning forum](https://social.msdn.microsoft.com/Forums/azure/home?forum=MachineLearning).
